thing-type.label: FGD211 Universal Dimmer 500W
thing-type.description: Universal Dimmer 500W<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtRemotely controlled Dimmer designed to operate with or without neutral lead. It may be used as a switch in systems without neutral lead.</p&gt <p&gtAs a Dimmer it operates under the following loads:</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtconventional incandescent</li&gt <li&gtHalogen 230V</li&gt <li&gtlow voltage halogen 12V (with electronic transformers)</li&gt <li&gtdimmable LED</li&gt <li&gtwhen used with FGB001 it may operate with any dimmable load up to 500W</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtThe Dimmer enters the mode of inclusion after a quick pressing three times the push-button connected to S1 terminal or push-button B located inside the housing. For bi-stable switch perform 3 position changes.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtThe Dimmer enters the mode of exclusion after a quick pressing three times the push-button connected to S1 terminal or push-button B located inside the housing. For bi-stable switch perform 3 position changes</p&gt
